main.name: Angelica Reyes
main.description: Enthusiastic and versatile web producer and content manager with over 5 years of IT-related work experience. Professional experience with digital marketing, e-commerce, proficient in Microsoft Office, Adobe Creative Suite, social media, and web content platforms.
main.bio: My name is Angelica Reyes but I go by Angie. I am graduated with a bachelors in computer science in 2015 from New York Institute of Technology. Since I have graduated, my career has been in digital marketing helping with coding emails, updating or creating pages on various CMS systems, and coming up with creative for multiple brands. I learned Photoshop at my current job which is why I became their digital designer. I love learning new things which is why I want to get into web development. Having some hands on at work has spiked an interest in learning more about it.
main.contactmessage: Submit the form below and I will get back to you as soon as I can.
